name: POLK COUNTY, IOWA
description: Serving the public of Polk County and engaging in local government activities
sampleDescriptions: We are currently helping the County navigate the COVID related relief packages, assisting with BUILD Grant projects, Refugee Housing initiatives and briefing the Supervisors on future infrastructure l
